Steve Cooper has guided Nottingham Forest from the relegation places to the Championship play-off spots

articles.title: Green Bay Packers will make their London debut against the New York Giants in October - Daily Mail
articles.description: The New Orleans Saints will host the Minnesota Vikings in north London the week before, while the Jacksonville Jaguars face the Denver Broncos at Wembley Stadium on October 30.
articles.content:
Aaron Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers will play their first overseas regular season game against the New York Giants at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on October 9.
